document_data.name: ''Boots of Aid and Comfort''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Boots of aid and comfort''''' were [[magic]]al boots that bolstered the healing powers of the wearer.
document_data.Description: These boots were well-made and provided significant comfort for the wearer.
document_data.Powers: When the wearer of the ''boots of aid and comfort'' healed another creature, that creature received additional relief.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, one pair of these boots remained in possession of [[Grat]], a merchant of [[Cult of the Absolute]] who traded at the [[Shattered Sanctum]].
